question: The Sopranos debuts on HBO / Fatboy Slim’s “Praise You” hits number 1 in the UK / Denver Broncos beat Atlants Falcons in Superbowl XXXIII

Great Britain triggered Article 50 which eventually led to Brexit in 2020 / A snap general election is held in the UK, three years before the next is due / Real Madrid beat Juventus 4-1 in the champions league final
#MeTOO goes viral / Jamal Kashoggi was murdered in the Saudi Arabian embassy in Istanbul / Prince Harry married Megan Markle
The UK experiences the worst winter since 1946-47 / Summer Holiday featuring Cliff Richard premieres in London / The Beatles release their debut album “Please Please Me”
23.5 million tune in to watch “Live and Let Die” on TV. A record TV audience for a film / Robin Cousins wins Gold for GB in the winter Olympics in Lake Placid / Alton Towers opens
The first naturist beach opens near Hastings / Ipswich Town win the FA Cup / The Andrew Lloyd Weber musical Evita opens in London
The platinum jubilee of Queen Elizabeth II / Roman Abramovic gives up control of Chelsea FC / Sam Ryder finishes in second place in the Eurovision Song Contest
The Isle of Wight Festival begins featuring Jimi Hendrix, The Who and The Doors / Nijinsky wins The Derby, 2000 Guineas and St Ledger / The Goodies is first broadcast on BBC 2
Jeremy Clarkson is sacked from his role on Top Gear / Chris Froome wins the Tour de France / England introduces a 5p charge for carrier bags in supermarkets
Captain Tom Moore raised £32 million for NHS charities / Argos ended its printed catalogue / We stayed at home a lot
